identity.title: Construct a program that creates unique 3 digit combinations

content.prompt: Construct a program which creates and prints all three-digit combinations from numbers 1-4 such that each number appears at most once and the combinations are listed from the smallest to the greatest. The program must also output the total number of the combinations. For example, output 123, 124, 132 ... total: 24.
content.source_code:
amount = 0
i = 0
while i < 4:
  i += 1
  j = 0
  while j < 4:
    j += 1
    k = 0
    while k < 4:
      k += 1
      if k != i $$toggle::and::or::not::$$ k != j $$toggle::or::and::not::$$ i != j:
          amount += 1
          print(i, j, k)

print("The total number of 3 digit combinations is", amount)
